title: Farm Machine Safety: Loader and Skid Steer Safety

tasks.task: Operating farm loaders and skid steer loaders safely
subtasks: Verifying correct tire spacing and rear ballast
Gradually stopping loaders when raising/lowering loads
Being cautious around people when moving loads
Securing loads properly when moving around people
Being careful when turning uphill or on slopes
Driving with loads close to the ground on public roads
Allowing for additional equipment length during turns
Balancing loads evenly and ensuring stability
Using flashing warning lights and slow-moving vehicle emblems
Not handling large round bales without proper attachments
Engaging parking brake or putting transmission in park before servicing
Removing hydraulic pressure before disconnecting lines
